com.yantra.interop.japi

Class YIFClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.interop.japi.YIFClientFactory

  • public abstract class YIFClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The methods provided in this class return an implementation of the YIFApi interface. The implementation returned through the methods in this factory provide a protocol agnostic approach to invoking provided and custom written APIs developed within the supplied framework. The YIFApi returned provides basic capabilities for various supported protocols like EJB/HTTP etc. and will not provide advanced functionality like authentication.

    This class was originally provided as a utility to hide the complexity of EJB/HTTP programming from developers customizing or extending the product. Presently, the underlying standards are fairly mature and network programming via well known protocols like EJB/HTTP/SOAP is now routine. As a result, all methods in this class that return an implementation for protocols other than LOCAL will likely be deprecated in the next major version of the product.

      • getApi

        public abstract YIFApi getApi(java.lang.String protocolName,
                              java.util.Map overrideProperties)
                       throws YIFClientCreationException
        getApi return an implementation of the YIFApi interface.

        protocolName Required. valid values are EJB/HTTP/HTTPS/LOCAL. overrideProperties optional. Set "yif.httpapi.url" to your HTTP/HTTPS URL in the map. When map is null or if yif.httpapi.url is not found in the map then the yif.httpapi.url value is read from the yifclient.properties file. An implementaion of YIFApi interface.


        Throws:
        YIFClientCreationException
